content:
I've been trying out the Mac OS X App for Zulip, and I have to say that I'm having problems with it. Too big problems:

  • High latency, messages sometimes take a while to send and/or appear
  • I can't copy and paste out from Zulip into other things

Too bad, because it's annoying to have to Pin a distinct tab per Zulip Org you belong to.
You can't copy-and-paste ?
I cannot
actually I also cannot copy-and-paste within Zulip
Copy just doesn't seem to work at all
switched back to pin tabs, which I like better anyway, but i'm starting to acquire quite the collection :)
it'd be nice if I could arrange them into groups in FF
arranging into groups like what?
ala panorama?
I think something in the direction of panorama but with probably a smarter ui would be great for browsers
there needs to be a distinction between apps and just pages or temporary stuff you're navigating
stuff like cmd+space in mac should be something good to search and load apps inside the browser
the idea of hiding and showing tabs also
dunno what would be good but there's a huge space to improve in this space
I'm still confused by @nikomatsakis 's inability to copy-and-paste
I can definitely do so...

ala panorama?

I meant more like when you have a folder on your android home screen
@nikomatsakis is this OS X some new thing? I've been using an OS X app for a while for Zulip and so I'm wondering if somehow you got something newer that is even more broken than usual?
I just downloaded it today, idk
that said, I am running a really rather out of date OS X version, maybe I need to upgrade a few other things :)

The app on Android notifies me of messages I am mentioned in but then when I click on them, it doesn't show the new messages. The same with new messages on the streams. It wasn't used to be like this. Someone else facing this or its just me ?
@blitzerr I have that problem too. I have to enter twice in the thread to load its new messages.
@pachi Thanks for confirming.
yeah faced the same issue the other day.
Just received an update on the android app. Looks much better now. (haven't tried to check if that bug persists)
Thanks for mentioning about the update @DPC . That seems to have fixed the issue.
Zulip needs to be able to auto update. It's doesn't do that yet.
for me it did auto update
Hmm.. strange
There might be some setting I haven't enabled
possible. I'm on Android 8.1 btw if that matters
At least the update fixed the issue. I am happy about that
Thanks @DPC
